thread.title: BRIEF-Hammerson Posts FY ‍Adjusted Profit Of 246.3 Million STG

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hammerson Posts FY ‍Adjusted Profit Of 246.3 Million STG
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Hammerson Plc:
* FINAL DIVIDEND 14.8 PENCEPER SHARE * TOTAL DIVIDEND 25.5 PENCEPER SHARE * FY ‍ADJUSTED PROFIT 246.3 MILLION STG VERSUS 230.7 MILLION STG YEAR AGO
* ‍FY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE 31.1P​ * AS DEC 31 ‍EPRA NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE £7.76​ * ‍AS AT DEC 31, GEARING 58%​ * AS AT DEC 31 ‍LOAN TO VALUE 36%​ * FY NET RENTAL INCOME ‍370.4​ MILLION POUNDS VERSUS 346.5 MILLION POUNDS YEAR AGO
* FY DIVIDEND PER SHARE ‍14.8​ PENCE VERSUS 13.9 PENCE A YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
